scripts.dev: rm src/database/test.sqlite3 & npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run && export NODE_ENV=development && npx nodemon index.ts
scripts.database: rm src/database/test.sqlite3 & npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run
scripts.test: rm src/database/test.sqlite3 & npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run export NODE_ENV=development && jest --detectOpenHandles
